title: Spectator Out Loud: Melvyn Bragg, Svitlana Moronets, Matthew Parris and Lionel Shriver
description:
On this week's episode: Melvyn Bragg on the continuing genius of Paul McCartney and what makes the BBC great (0:55). Svitlana Morenets, a Ukrainian refugee now working at The Spectator on why her country will never accept a peace deal with Putin (06:00). Matthew Parris says we're being unfair on Carrie Johnson (15:43), and Lionel Shriver reads her column on the madness of the central bankers (22.18).Â 

Presented by Angus Colwell.

Produced by Angus Colwell and Cindy Yu.
